Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12000. This represents a significant savings compared to the market rate and is tailored to meet your specific needs. I am confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for you. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
